entry.title: Introducing Kitchen Sink
entry.content:
Kitchen Sink embodies my way of imagining personal sites: messy but allows to experiment with a bit of everything. Personal and #experimental, but still built on solid #foundations.

Rather than writing a long post here, this page only is an announcement. You’ll find long post on the project’s website.

I encourage you to read these Kitchen-Sink links here:

  • The Kitchen-Sink Philosophy
  • A feature list
  • The code on GitHub
entry.summary: After having written a [number of articles](/topics/web.html) about my blog-engine. And motivated by curious people wanting to see how it's built, I've open-sourced my blog-engine and named it _Kitchen Sink_.
